MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description: Our intention was to create affordable, flexible and efficient email extractor software. We are proud of the fact that we managed to achieve our chief aim.

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_100: Validate your mailing lists for free with Email Verifier
Site.Site_Keywords: email verifier,email validator,email list,mail list,email marketing software,verify emails,validate emails,software,internet,email,web
Site.Site_Description_250: Free Email Verifier is known as a software that verifies the validity of electronic mail addresses inside the emai lists. It will save your time and finances for your own businesses who needs to manage fresh mail lists.
Site.Site_Description_450: Free Email Verifier is known as a software that verifies the validity of electronic mail addresses inside the emai lists. It will save your time and finances for your own businesses who needs to manage fresh mail lists. Free Email Verfier eliminates bad, not existed and dupicate email address.

English.Char_Desc_2000:
Free Email Verifier is known as a software that verifies the validity of electronic mail addresses inside the emai lists. It will save your time and finances for your own businesses who needs to manage fresh mail lists. Free Email Verfier eliminates bad, not existed and dupicate email address. This email verifier is a really effective and stable multi-threaded software utility,very effective at handling big volumes of e-mail addresses providing high speed broadband email verification (with over 1000 e-mail validations per minute).You are able to import/export the mail addresses from/to .txt and .csv files.
The product uns on a definite algorithm as used in Internet Service Provider mail systems and email addresses are and extracted from the Domain Name Servers. It doesn't send the though - Free Email Verifier disconnects when the informs the software whether the exists or not. Free Email Verifier is for system administrators, marketers, webmasters, business owners, programmersand also for everyone who has his own emailing lists and desires to maintain the lists up-to-date.
